body_html:
The space here is intentional.
It is supposed to get the link without the cudnn version number:
libcudnn.so (libc6,x86-64) => /usr/local/cuda-8.0/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudnn.so
@DeliciousHair was it causing any issue for you?

body:
The space here is intentional. 
It is supposed to get the link without the cudnn version number:
	`libcudnn.so (libc6,x86-64) => /usr/local/cuda-8.0/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudnn.so`
@DeliciousHair was it causing any issue for you?
